TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Trace extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一组方法和属性，帮助您跟踪代码的执行。

span.span: Provides a set of methods and properties that help you trace the execution of your code.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 类中的属性和方法来检测发布版本。You can use the properties and methods in the class to instrument release builds. 借助检测功能，可以监视应用程序在真实设置中运行的运行状况。Instrumentation allows you to monitor the health of your application running in real-life settings. 跟踪有助于隔离问题并修复它们，而不会影响正在运行的系统。Tracing helps you isolate problems and fix them without disturbing a running system. 此类提供用于显示 对话框的方法，并发出将始终 的断言。This class provides methods to display an dialog box, and to emit an assertion that will always . 此类提供以下变体中的写入方法： 、、和 。This class provides write methods in the following variations: , , , and . 和 类提供动态控制跟踪输出的方式。The and classes provide means to dynamically control the tracing output. 您可以修改这些开关的值，而无需重新编译应用程序。You can modify the values of these switches without recompiling your application. 有关使用配置文件设置开关的信息，请参阅 类和[如何：创建、初始化和配置跟踪开关](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-create-initialize-and-configure-trace-switches.md)主题。For information on using the configuration file to set a switch, see the class and the [How to: Create, Initialize and Configure Trace Switches](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-create-initialize-and-configure-trace-switches.md) topic. 您可以通过将 实例添加到 集合或从中删除实例来自定义跟踪输出的目标。You can customize the tracing output's target by adding instances to or removing instances from the collection. 集合由 和 类共享;将跟踪侦听器添加到任一类会将侦听器添加到这两个类中。The collection is shared by both the and the classes; adding a trace listener to either class adds the listener to both. 默认情况下，使用 类发出跟踪输出。By default, trace output is emitted using the class. > [!NOTE] > 如果跟踪侦听器使用的资源不可用，则在跟踪时将跟踪侦听器添加到 集合可能导致引发异常。Adding a trace listener to the collection can cause an exception to be thrown while tracing, if a resource used by the trace listener is not available. 条件和引发的异常依赖于跟踪侦听器，在本主题中无法枚举。The conditions and the exception thrown depend on the trace listener and cannot be enumerated in this topic. 将对 方法的调用放在 `try`/`catch` 块以检测和处理跟踪侦听器中的任何异常时，可能会很有用。It may be useful to place calls to the methods in `try`/`catch` blocks to detect and handle any exceptions from trace listeners. > [!NOTE] > 如果将跟踪侦听器添加到部分受信任的代码，则您将收到 异常，因为添加跟踪侦听器需要 权限。If you add trace listeners to partially trusted code, you will get a exception, because adding trace listeners requires permission. 若要跟踪正在 Visual Studio 的沙盒中运行的部分受信任的代码，请不要添加跟踪侦听器。To trace partially trusted code that is running in a sandbox in Visual Studio, do not add trace listeners. 相反，请在 "**输出**" 窗口中查看 和 消息。Instead, view the and messages in the **Output** window. 类提供属性以获取或设置 的级别、，以及每次写入后是否 。The class provides properties to get or set the level of , the , and whether to after each write. 若要设置 的 和 ，你可以编辑与应用程序名称对应的配置文件。To set the and for , you can edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 配置文件的格式应类似于以下示例：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ``` 特性应用于 的方法。The attribute is applied to the methods of . 支持 的编译器会忽略对这些方法的调用，除非 "TRACE" 被定义为条件编译符号。Compilers that support ignore calls to these methods unless "TRACE" is defined as a conditional compilation symbol. 请参阅编译器的文档，确定是否支持 以及用于定义条件编译符号的语法。Refer to a compiler's documentation to determine whether is supported and the syntax for defining a conditional compilation symbol. > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Studio 项目中，默认情况下，为调试版本定义“DEBUG”条件编译符号，并为调试版本和发行版本定义“TRACE”符号。In Visual Studio projects, by default, the "DEBUG" conditional compilation symbol is defined for debug builds, and the "TRACE" symbol is defined for both debug and release builds. 有关如何禁用此行为的信息，请参阅 Visual Studio 文档。For information about how to disable this behavior, see the Visual Studio documentation. 若要在 C# 中定义“TRACE”条件编译符号，请在使用命令行编译代码时将 `/d:TRACE` 选项添加到编译器命令行，或将 `#define TRACE` 添加到文件顶部。To define the "TRACE" conditional compilation symbol in C#, add the `/d:TRACE` option to the compiler command line when you compile your code using a command line, or add `#define TRACE` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，将 `/d:TRACE=True` 选项添加到编译器命令行或将 `#Const TRACE=True` 添加到文件。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:TRACE=True` option to the compiler command line or add `#Const TRACE=True` to the file. C++编译器不支持 。 is not supported by the C++ compiler. 若要提供等效的功能，必须在 `#if defined(TRACE) ... #endif` 块中包含对 方法的调用，并将 `/DTRACE` 选项添加到编译器命令行，或将 `#define TRACE` 添加到该文件。To provide equivalent functionality, you must enclose calls to the methods of in an `#if defined(TRACE) ... #endif` block, and add the `/DTRACE` option to the compiler command line or add `#define TRACE` to the file. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 来指示程序执行的开始和结束。The following example uses to indicate the beginning and the end of a program's execution. 该示例还使用 和 方法来区分跟踪输出。The example also uses the and methods to distinguish the tracing output. 有关使用 的更完整示例，请参阅[如何：向应用程序代码添加跟踪语句](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-add-trace-statements-to-application-code.md)。For a more complete example of the use of , see [How to: Add Trace Statements to Application Code](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-add-trace-statements-to-application-code.md). [!code-cpp[Classic Trace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Trace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Trace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要在发布版本中进行断言，请使用 方法。Use the method if you want to do assertions in release builds. 方法仅适用于调试版本。The method works only in debug builds. 有关详细信息，请参阅[托管代码中的断言](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code)。For more information, see [Assertions in Managed Code](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code). 通常， 方法用于标识程序开发过程中的逻辑错误。Typically, the method is used to identify logic errors during program development. 计算条件。 evaluates the condition. 如果结果为 `false`，它会向 集合发送失败消息。If the result is `false`, it sends a failure message to the collection. 您可以通过向 集合添加 或从中删除一个来自定义此行为。You can customize this behavior by adding a to, or removing one from, the collection. 当应用程序在用户界面模式下运行时，它将显示一个消息框，其中显示带有文件和行号的调用堆栈。When the application runs in user-interface mode, it displays a message box that shows the call stack with file and line numbers. 消息框包含三个按钮： "**中止**"、"**重试**" 和 "**忽略**"。The message box contains three buttons: **Abort**, **Retry**, and **Ignore**. 单击 "**中止**" 按钮将终止应用程序。Clicking the **Abort** button terminates the application. 如果你的应用程序在调试器中运行，则单击 "**重试**" 会将你发送到调试器中的代码，如果不是，则单击 "提供" 以打开调试器。Clicking **Retry** sends you to the code in the debugger if your application is running in a debugger, or offers to open a debugger if it is not. 单击 "**忽略**" 将继续执行代码中的下一个指令。Clicking **Ignore** continues with the next instruction in the code. > [!NOTE] > 消息框的显示取决于是否存在 。The display of the message box depends on the presence of the . 如果 不在 集合中，则不会显示消息框。If the is not in the collection, the message box is not displayed. 可以通过[<clear>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)、 [<删除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)或对 属性（）调用`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`方法来删除。The can be removed by the [<clear>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), the [<remove>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), or by calling the method on the property (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`). 你可以在配置文件中更改与你的应用程序名称对应的 的行为。You can change the behavior of the in the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中，您可以启用和禁用断言消息框或设置 属性。In this file, you can enable and disable the assert message box or set the property. 配置文件的格式应如下所示：The configuration file should be formatted as follows: ```xml ``` ## Examples 下面的示例为数组创建索引。The following example creates an index for an array. 然后执行某些操作来设置索引的值。Then some action is performed that sets the value of the index. 接下来，代码调用 来验证索引值是否有效。Next the code calls to verify the index value is valid. 如果无效，则 输出调用堆栈。If it is not valid, the outputs the call stack. [!code-cpp[Classic Trace.Assert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace.Assert Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Trace.Assert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace.Assert Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Trace.Assert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace.Assert Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`. 除非显式调用 或 ，否则刷新流将不会刷新其基础编码器。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call or . 将 设置为 `true` 表示将数据从缓冲区刷新到流，但编码器状态不会被刷新。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 这允许编码器保留其状态（部分字符），以使其能够正确编码下一个字符块。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. 此方案影响 UTF8 和 UTF7，其中某些字符只能在编码器接收到相邻字符后编码。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters. 若要设置 的 和 ，还可以编辑与应用程序名称对应的配置文件。To set the and for , you can also edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 配置文件的格式应类似于以下示例：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ```

span.span: Flushes the output buffer, and then closes the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在输出转到文件（例如 ）时使用此方法。Use this method when the output is going to a file, such as to the . 除非显式调用 或 ，否则刷新流将不会刷新其基础编码器。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call or . 将 设置为 `true` 表示将数据从缓冲区刷新到流，但编码器状态不会被刷新。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 这允许编码器保留其状态（部分字符），以使其能够正确编码下一个字符块。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. 此方案影响 UTF8 和 UTF7，其中某些字符只能在编码器接收到相邻字符后编码。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个名为 `myTextListener`的 。The following example creates a named `myTextListener`. `myTextListener` 使用名为 `myOutputWriter` 的 写入名为 `TestFile.txt`的文件。`myTextListener` uses a called `myOutputWriter` to write to a file named `TestFile.txt`. 该示例创建文件、流和文本编写器，将一行文本写入文件，然后刷新并关闭输出。The example creates the file, stream and text writer, writes one line of text to the file, and then flushes and closes the output. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认跟踪侦听器的默认行为是在用户界面模式下运行应用程序时，将 `message` 参数输出到消息框，并将其输出到 集合中的 实例。The default behavior for the default trace listener is to output the `message` parameter to a message box when the application runs in user-interface mode, and to the instances in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 消息框的显示取决于是否存在 。The display of the message box is dependent on the presence of the . 如果 不在 集合中，则不会显示消息框。If the is not in the collection, the message box is not displayed. 可以通过[<clear>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)、 [<删除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)或对 属性（）调用`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`方法来删除。The can be removed by the [<clear>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), the [<remove>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), or by calling the method on the property (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`). 您可以通过将 添加到 集合或从该集合中删除一个来自定义此行为。You can customize this behavior by adding a to, or by removing one from, the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法在异常处理过程中打印消息。The following example uses the method to print a message during exception handling. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果跟踪侦听器不是线程安全的，则始终使用全局锁，而不考虑 的值。The global lock is always used if the trace listener is not thread safe, regardless of the value of . 属性用于确定侦听器是否是线程安全的。The property is used to determine if the listener is thread safe. 仅当 `false` 的值并且 `true` 的值时，才使用全局锁。The global lock is not used only if the value of is `false` and the value of is `true`. 默认行为是使用全局锁。The default behavior is to use the global lock. 若要为 设置 ，还可以编辑与应用程序名称对应的配置文件。To set the for , you can also edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 配置文件的格式应类似于以下示例：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，输出将写入 的实例。By default, the output is written to an instance of . 此方法调用跟踪侦听器的 方法。This method calls the method of the trace listener. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 提供为网页定制的跟踪功能。ASP.NET supplies tracing functionality tailored for Web pages. 若要在 ASP.NET 页中写入跟踪消息，请使用 属性。To write trace messages in ASP.NET pages, use the property. 默认情况下，在与 ASP.NET 网页关联的代码中，语句 `Trace.Write("...")` 是对 属性的 方法的调用。By default, in code associated with an ASP.NET Web page, the statement `Trace.Write("...")` is a call to the method of the property. 若要在网页中使用 类，必须包括命名空间，例如 `System.Diagnostics.Trace.Write("...")`。To use the class in Web pages, you must include the namespace, for example, `System.Diagnostics.Trace.Write("...")`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个名为 `generalSwitch`的 。The following example creates a named `generalSwitch`. 此开关在代码示例之外设置。This switch is set outside the code sample. 如果开关设置为 `Error` 或更高版本，则该示例会将 `value` 参数的第一个名称输出到 。If the switch is set to the `Error` or higher, the example outputs the first name of the `value` parameter to the . 有关将侦听器添加到 集合的信息，请参阅 类。For information on adding a listener to the collection, see the class. 然后，如果 设置为 `Verbose`，则此示例将在第一条消息所在的行上输出一条消息。Then, if the is set to `Verbose`, the example outputs a message on the same line as the first message. 第二条消息后跟行结束符。The second message is followed by a line terminator.
